description: This term refers to concepts, words, or ideas that are associated with a state of having more than enough of something. This can relate to resources, information, or even abstract concepts.

usage_examples.english: The overabundance of information online can make it difficult to find reliable sources.
usage_examples.japanese: オンライン上の情報の過剰は、信頼できる情報源を見つけるのを困難にする可能性があります。(Onrain-jou no jouhou no kajou wa, shinrai dekiru jouhougen o mitsukeru no o konnan ni suru kanousei ga arimasu.)

usage_examples.english: An overabundance of rainfall led to severe flooding in the region.
usage_examples.japanese: 過剰な降雨量が、その地域で深刻な洪水を引き起こしました。(Kajou na kouuryou ga, sono chiiki de shinkoku na kouzui o hikiokoshimashita.)

usage_examples.english: The market is experiencing an overabundance of wheat this year.
usage_examples.japanese: 今年は市場で小麦の過剰供給が起きています。(Kotoshi wa ichiba de komugi no kajou kyoukyuu ga okiteimasu.)
